messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
System Failure

A shuttle inspector started laughing madly over the radio and then threw herself into an engine turbine. The shuttle will be delayed by three minutes.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on [REDACTED], we believe that all of the station's lesser lifeforms has developed [REDACTED] level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
System Failure

The shuttle's custodian was found washing the windows with their own blood. The shuttle will be delayed by three minutes.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We've been tipped off that a cult may have infiltrated Space Station 13. It's probably nothing to worry about.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Higher Dimensional Affairs

Figments from an eldritch god are being summoned by Mercury CVXI into Security Office from an unknown dimension. Disrupt the ritual at all costs!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Higher Dimensional Affairs

An acausal dimensional event has been detected in your sector. Event has been flagged EXTINCTION-CLASS. Directing all available assets toward simulating solutions. SOLUTION ETA: 60 SECONDS.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Higher Dimensional Affairs

Simulations on acausal dimensional event complete. Deploying solution package now. Deployment ETA: ONE MINUTE.

messages.author: Gragnir Grolob (Curator)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">so i heard there is a cult, maybe 4 people died or something? i dunno, also, i have a new book, if anybody is alive and reads this, come to library</font>

messages.author: Gragnir Grolob (Curator)
messages.body:
BREAKING NEWS:
This crew fucking sucks
NARSIE WIL SOON BE WITH US, PREPARE, PREPARE, PREPARE
